title: Rescue the Grand Duke
content:
ssues later. Go to our camp - the Absolute can't reach you there.

Speak to Grand Duke Ravengard.

Grand Duke Ravengard is safe at last. We should speak to him at our camp. In exchange for an eternal pact with Wyll, Mizora resurrected Grand Duke Ravengard. We should speak with him.

Speak to Duke Ravengard at the camp to fulfil this objective then follow The Blade of Frontiers to continue Wyll's questline.

How to unlock Rescue the Grand Duke

Rescue the Grand Duke Rewards

Quest optional Reward
